posts.description: Sending you üíï this amazing Friday! I hope you have the courage to do what you're scared of today. I hope you push out of your comfort zone and explore today. Be unafraid! Have a fearless Friday y'all! Full outfit from @popflex_active.

The 5 people closest to you are a reflection of who you are. üôÇ Think about that. And think about whether or not you like the people closest to you. I'm so grateful to be growing the #Blogifam with talented, smart and passionate individuals who actually CARE. It's not easy finding good people. Oh boy...Trust me. My 20s were all about learning what it meant to be backstabbed by my closest confidants. Taken advantage of for my trust in people. Steered in the wrong direction ON PURPOSE because certain "friends" wanted to see me fail. With age comes wisdom, experience and the ability to see past the fakeness early on. Growing the fam is a slow process. But I'd sooooo rather have that than rapidly hiring and firing. I'm ALL about the culture of our company. Skills can be learned. But a positive spirit and a good heart need to be innate. This company was founded on the principles passion, loyalty, trustworthiness, and kindness. And I'm obsessed with protecting the magic we've created. ‚ú® Love you guys! ‚ô•Ô∏è #blogilates #poparmy
Acai bowl for brekkie. üçì What about you? Are you more of a sweet or savory type?

One thing I would tell my young self? Stop caring about what other people think of you. I was so self conscious growing up. üôáüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è What about you? What would you tell your younger self if you had the chance?

Do you guys ever get bored of your workouts? Be honest! (It's ok if you feel bored hearing my voice all the time! I won't be offended. Only a little üòÇ) If you feel like you're dragging yourself to exercise, you gotta change it up! I've had many phases...a weight lifting phase, a dance phase, a running phase etc - I do this to keep my body guessing and to keep my mind excited and always learning! Yesterday I did Hot Yoga because my hamstrings have been sooooo stiff from all the sprints I've been doing on the treadmill. üèÉüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è And the change in pace felt beautiful! Don't be afraid to switch it up. No workout is superior to another - it's about how much enthusiasm and energy you put into each one that makes it effective. Wearing all @popflex_active

First of all, Happy üåé #EarthDay ‚òÄÔ∏èerrbuddy! Second of all - can you believe this is an old dress from 7 years ago...from Target...on the clearance rack!? It's a keeper! üëç Anyway, today I want you to get outside and do something naturey! Maybe I'll buy some flowers üå∫ for the garden and plant them! Let's see if I can activate my green thumb. What will you do today?

Remember to celebrate. Too often we rush rush rush - trying to get to the next place faster! But why the hurry? To live a life of happiness and fulfillment, you need to stop. ‚úã Slow down. Look back every once in a while and see how far you've come. Appreciate your journey and where it has taken you. I hope you know you're amazing. ‚òÄÔ∏è #blogilates

When I found graffiti on the Blogilates HQ building, it upset me. üò† But then, I chose to let it inspire me. ‚ú® Guys, this is how you turn hate...into love. üíó Literally. I'm thankful for whoever vandalized the building, because without you, I wouldn't have been pushed to create art üé® and make our HQ prettier!
Food. Is. Life. ü•ò What are you eating?
Never judge someone's first day at the gym. They are trying. Just like you are.

The first video in the 6-Week Body Toning Bootcamp is up! üí™üëô So here's how it works! Your challenge is to do the workout of the week at least once that week. That means - 4x through for a full 28 min workout. (I say once because some of you may be doing #PIIT28 or the #Blogilates workout calendar.) When the second workout comes out the following week - do the workout from week 1 and the new workout from week 2 at least once each...until you work up to 6 days a week on the 6th week. Make sense? Remember...the challenge is at least once a week for the new workouts...but no one is stopping you from doing it more! Bonus points if you do! ‚≠êÔ∏è Go watch my new video at youtube.com/blogilates (bio link)!

Sending you good vibes today from mermaid headquarters. üê¨üí¶ New tank up at popflexactive.com (bio link)...go get one before the 6 Week Body Toning Bootcamp releases today! Who's ready!?!? #popflex #poparmy

Guys! I filmed my first vlog ever! ‚ò∫Ô∏è Thank you for inspiring me to do this! I really hope you like it and that I'm semi-entertaining. I'm taking you behind the scenes with me on a shoot we did in Malibu üå¥ for the 6 Week Body Toning Bootcamp! I want you to see the üê¨üê¨üê¨ we saw! And lemme know how you like it...I'm open to all feedback! üé• Go watch it now youtube.com/blogilates (bio link) #blogilates

How I feel after a workout! üëäüí¶ No matter how unmotivated you think you are - try your best to get over that hump! Because I PROMISE - when you do - you're opening the doors to a natural stress reliever and a happiness machine! You don't have the pick the hardest workout that burns the most calories. Just do something active! Walk! Dance! Stretch! Whatever! Just move. I promise you will feel so much better. Take care of yourself. Love you. üì∑ by @samlivits #blogilates

Half way through the week Iike how I'm half way up these stairs! üòâ By the way, we're designing the 2018 Fit Planner right now! üìö I'm going to make changes and improvements based on your honest feedback. So please comment below and tell me what you want! I'll be reading through everything! Thank you!

Literally right after grabbing all my hair and getting ready to put it in a ponytail...MY VERY LAST HAIR TIE BROKE AND FLEW SOMEWHERE IN THE BUSHES NEVER TO BE FOUND AGAIN! üò≠ And that is the story behind this photo. Wearing all @popflex_active btw! üëç
